item.title: About Me
item.description: Who am I? I’m 25 years old and currently living in Auckland, New Zealand. I love working on the front-end, but I’m a capable full stack developer. I’m a hands-on engineer that loves a challenge, learning new skills and getting things done. My Interests Snowboarding - Got into it whilst living in Christchurch Music - Most sounds under the umbrella that is Electronic Dance Music, though DnB is closest to my ❤️
